items.badge_description: There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 20 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 5!

Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 25 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 6!
Ahh, the trusty pale ale; crisp, refreshing, and always a good choice in a bind. That's 10 different Pale Ales. Try 5 more for Level 3.

You’ve pledged allegiance, and now it’s time to enjoy some beer! Now remember, not all American beer is fizzy and yellow. That’s 35 different beers from a brewery in the United States. Try 5 more for Level 8.

Your quest to quench your thirst leaves no stone unturned! That's at least 15 distinct venues!

items.badge_description:
Thanks for visiting us today!
Level 25: Free Appetizer*
Level 50: $15 Off $25 Food Purchase*
Level 75: Free Badge Pint Glass*
Level 100: The Golden Ticket! $1 Entry to One Beer Dinner

*Offers only to be redeemed the day of badge level earned.
